comments.author: Omer Chaudhry
comments.content:
Hi, i visited Fairy Meadow in 1996 when i was just 16 years old,, that was my first ever traking expereince and that was the time when i discovered my first love with Nanga Parbat. i have been to other base camps e.g. Ropal, i.e the other side of mountain from Trishing, and Diamir camp,,, but Fairy Meadow has a charm and beauty of its own. i wish i can go there once more in my life.

i walked through the old road, all along the river till Fairy Meadows which is no more now,, Now mostky used way is through Fantori
